{{ardayearheader: *[[Oromë]] discovers the [[Elves]] near the shores of [[Sea of Helcar
Year of the Trees 1000: Helcar]]; he names them the Eldar, the People of the Stars. As a result of [[Morgoth
Year of the Trees 1050: Melkor]]'s spies and whispers, some Eldar are afraid of Oromë and flee as he approaches.<ref name="Annals">{{MR

{{ardayearheader: *About this time, it is possible that the first [[Orcs]] are created, being corrupted from Elves.<ref name="Annals" />
